Cheltenham Festival Races Day 1 - National Hunt Steeple Chase Odds

One of the day 1 Cheltenham races is the National Hunt Steeple Chase and is for novice chasers, it is the longest race at the Festival with the runners taking on a stamina sapping 4 mile trip around the Old Course. It is also a race for amateur jockeys who are always looking to make the most of their chance at the Festival, there will be a big field for punters to pick over as they look to start day 2 with a bang.

We have had some nice winners of the National Hunt Chase in recent years with the likes of Teaforthree and Back In Focus scoring over the past few years, both of them have gone onto bigger things since.
